statements: SELECT * FROM regulators;
SELECT regulator_name, department FROM regulators;
SELECT regulator_name, regulation_type FROM regulators WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM regulators WHERE regulator_id = 3;
SELECT regulator_id, regulator_name FROM regulators ORDER BY regulator_id DESC;
SELECT regulator_name, regulation_type FROM regulators WHERE department = 'Finance'
SELECT * FROM regulators WHERE regulator_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT regulator_name FROM regulators WHERE department = 'Legal' ORDER BY regulator_name DESC
SELECT regulator_name, department FROM regulators WHERE regulation_type = 'Compliance' AND department = 'HR'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regulators FROM regulators
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM regulatory_data WHERE policy_maker_id = 5;
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_data WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT id, regulation_id FROM regulatory_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM policy_maker WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE regulation_id = 1 ORDER BY policy_maker_id DESC;
SELECT id, data FROM regulatory_data WHERE policy_maker_id = 2 AND regulation_id = 3;
SELECT regulatory_data.id, policy_maker.name, policy_maker.email FROM regulatory_data JOIN policy_maker ON regulatory_data.policy_maker_id = policy_maker.id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE data LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;

SELECT policy_maker.name, COUNT(*) AS regulation_count FROM policy_maker JOIN regulatory_data ON policy_maker.id = regulatory_data.policy_maker_id GROUP BY policy_maker.name ORDER BY regulation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers
SELECT id, name, title FROM PolicyMakers
SELECT name, title, email FROM PolicyMakers
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE title = 'CEO'
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE title = 'CEO';
SELECT id, name FROM PolicyMakers WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com' AND title IN ('Manager', 'Director') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM PolicyMakers GROUP BY title HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT name, title, email FROM PolicyMakers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'B%' AND email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name, title;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM policy_makers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT regulatory_body, regulation_name FROM regulations WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT action_performed, log_time FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers WHERE title = 'CEO';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA' ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM policy_makers WHERE title = 'Manager' AND (first_name LIKE 'A%' OR last_name LIKE 'B%');
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND compliance_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
SELECT action_performed, log_time FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 'e3b3d8dc-8827-4774-938b-1e08f4ed3f6f' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM Regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT violation_description FROM Violations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, organization FROM PolicyMakers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title as RegulationTitle, description as RegulationDescription FROM Regulations ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM Regulations WHERE description LIKE '%important%';

SELECT p.name as PolicyMaker, r.title as Regulation, cd.compliance_status FROM PolicyMakers p INNER JOIN ComplianceData cd ON p.id = cd.policy_maker_id INNER JOIN Regulations r ON cd.regulation_id = r.id WHERE cd.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalViolations, MAX(violation_date) AS LatestViolationDate FROM Violations;
